feature.label: EASy Producer Core
feature.description: This feature provides the core functionalities of the EASy Producer tool for: * Integration of the different models and core capabilities * Reasoning infrastructure (not including a reasoner) * Instantiantion infrastructure (including standard VIL capabilities) * Eclipse editors This feature is deasinged for running inside of Eclipse only. This feature is mandatory.
